title: The best Thai peanut sauce
ingredients: ['375g creamy peanut butter', '125ml coconut milk', '3 tablespoons water', '3 tablespoons fresh lime juice', '3 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon fish sauce', '1 tablespoon hot chilli sauce', '1 tablespoon minced fresh root ginger', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander']
